body_html:
That seems like it isn't using the latest nightly builds. Could you try the following to ensure that you're not using an old, cached nightly build:

pip install -U tf-nightly-gpu

If that still doesn't work, do add more detailed version information by running the following in a Python shell:

import tensorflow as tf
print(tf.__version__)
print(tf.__git_version__)

Thanks

body:
That seems like it isn't using the latest nightly builds. Could you try the following to ensure that you're not using an old, cached nightly build:

```sh
pip install -U tf-nightly-gpu
```

If that still doesn't work, do add more detailed version information by running the following in a Python shell:

```python
import tensorflow as tf
print(tf.__version__)
print(tf.__git_version__)
```

Thanks
